title: Microsoft | L61 | Offer evaluation | Hyderabad
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: ~5 (4.9 years)
Prior Experience: Product based company, Bangalore
Base salary - 29.53L
Bonus - 5.63L
Stock - 2.34L
Current Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~37L


Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE II (L61)
Fixed Salary: Rs 33,00,000 (including PF)
Performance bonus: upto 20% of base pay, assuming 10% here (3,30,000)
Signon Bonus: Rs 3,00,000 (1st) + 3,00,000 (2nd)
Relocation Bonus: 1.29lakh (taxable) + 3,00,000 (Grossed up) = 4.29lakh
Stock bonus/RSU: 70000 USD (Standard 25% vest each year) 14L yearly
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~60 first year (50L onwards)

Please give suggestions.

title: Zeta SDE-2 offer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 2y 9m
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at MNC

Date of the Offer: Jan 24
Company: Zeta 
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 28 LPA (lowballed me beacuse my current CTC was low)
Stock bonus: 14L vested over 4 years (10%, 20%, 30% and 40% in 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th year respectively)
Bonus: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 29.4L
Benefits: Standard benefits, nothing stands out
Other details: Had 2 other competing offers for 25LPA
salary: 28 Lpa (lowballed Me Beacuse My Current Ctc Was Low)

title: Google | L4 | Bangalore |
content:
Education: B-tech from Tier-1 College (Not IIT)
Years of Experience: 3 years (in June'24)
Prior Experience: Software Engineer 2 at a B2B company
Previous Base: 35.91 LPA
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Base: 37.6 LPA
Signing Bonus: 5 L
Stock bonus: $100K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: 15% of Base
Relocation Bonus : No Relocation Bonus

Will write interview experience in detail in another post. Whole process took around 5 months.
